oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lewis Cass
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Lewis Cass with print and written name below. Portrait from waist up. He wears a dark coat and necktie and a white shirt and collar. He holds a book in his hand. Engraved by T.B. Welch from a drawing by J.B. Longacre.
American military officer and politician. Served as an American ambassador; territorial governor of Michigan; and U.S. Senator from Michigan, 1849-1851. Secretary of War 1831-1836.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cass, Lewis, 1782-1866;Thames, Battle of the, Ont., 1813;United States--History--War of 1812;U.S. Army campaigns of the War of 1812
Military
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Longacre, J.B.
